Question & Options:
Which of the following statements accurately describes Katie's experiences related to Slender Man?
Options:
A. a) Katie developed an obsession with Slender Man sightings and videos.
B. b) Katie was haunted by a paranormal presence during a field trip to historic Clifton Cemetery.
C. c) Slender Man is known to infect people's minds and drive them insane.
D. d) Katie contacted Allison Riley for advice on reaching Slender Man.
Correct Answer: a) Katie developed an obsession with Slender Man sightings and videos. & b) Katie was haunted by a paranormal presence during a field trip to historic Clifton Cemetery. & c) Slender Man is known to infect people's minds and drive them insane. & d) Katie contacted Allison Riley for advice on reaching Slender Man.

Question & Options:
What significant actions did Wren and Lizzie take in relation to the Slender Man incident?
Options:
A. a) Wren attempted to contact Slender Man with Lizzie's help.
B. b) Lizzie suffered a major panic attack during the events.
C. c) Wren used a piece of handmade pottery as a means to retrieve Katie.
D. d) Wren and Lizzie both interpreted their actions as a form of surrender.
Correct Answer: a) Wren attempted to contact Slender Man with Lizzie's help. & c) Wren used a piece of handmade pottery as a means to retrieve Katie.
